description: Dan Wakin is an editor in the Obituaries department. Previously, he was deputy editorial director of NYT Global, a team established to increase the international audience of the Times, andÂ  a deputy editor in the Culture department. As a reporter, his beats have included religion, classical music and dance and general assignment. He has covered stories in the Middle East and Europe, including the election of two popes, and served as a correspondent for The Associated Press in Rome, Johannesburg and Newark. Mr. Wakin is the author of
title: Daniel J. Wakin
